name: Book of Thoth
shortDescription: The Divine Grimoire of Egypt's God of Wisdom
fullDescription:
The Divine Grimoire of Egypt's God of Wisdom The Book of Thoth is a legendary Egyptian magical text said to have been written by Thoth
                    himself, the ibis-headed god of wisdom, writing, magic, and the moon. According to
                    ancient sources, this book contained only two spells, but these spells granted their
                    reader godlike powers over the cosmos itself.

properties.name: Author
properties.value: Thoth, Egyptian god of wisdom and writing

properties.name: Location
properties.value: Hidden at the bottom of the Nile
